data.name: Spellcraft
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Spellcraft!


Spellcraft is a new type of competitive strategy game where players collect and command heroes from colliding worlds, and cast powerful spells to turn the tide of battle.

Collect, Command & Compete

From developers who brought you Warcraft, StarCraft, Magic: Arena, Guild Wars, and Diablo comes Spellcraft. It captures the most memorable moments from our favorite competitive games, refined into something entirely new.

A New Type of Strategy Game

Spellcraft is a fast-action, competitive game that requires both strategic thinking and quick decision-making to achieve victory. It doesn’t play like any other games we’ve played so we’ve taken to calling it a Real-Time Tactics game. We think we've created something new and fun that you'll like.


Plan Like a General

Build your strategy, test it in battle, and demolish your adversaries.


In Spellcraft, you'll collect and command a team of fantastic Heroes and wield their powers to overcome your opponents. With a nearly limitless number of combinations, the team you assemble is as unique as your playstyle.

A Level Playing Field

We're creating a game we want everyone to be able to play and enjoy.


Spellcraft is a free-to-play game. We want the game to be fair for all players, so we’re avoiding exploitative monetization schemes. We aim to create a game that’s fair-to-play in addition to free-to-play.

Join Us On Discord

Join the Spellcraft Discord to stay up to date on our progress, meet other players, and chat with the development team.

data.short_description: From developers who brought you Warcraft, StarCraft, Guild Wars, Magic: Arena and Diablo comes Spellcraft, a new type of competitive strategy game where players collect and command an army of incredible heroes from colliding worlds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5670 / Nvidia GeForce 8800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.00 Ghz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5670 / Nvidia GeForce 8800
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
